document_data.name: ''Doomkin scarab''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Doomkin scarabs''''' were enchanted [[amulet]]s that belonged to the elite fighting force of the [[Cult of the Dragon]], the Doomkin ''circa'' [[1369 DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Doomkin scarabs'' were jewels cut into a shape of a [[scarab]], common among magical amulets. The scarab was decorated with the sigil of the Cult of the Dragon.
document_data.Powers: ''Doomkin scarabs'' served only one function to allow the Cult of the Dragon members to ''[[dominate person|dominate]]'' the minds of their opponents.
document_data.History: In 1369 DR, the Cult of the Dragon invaded the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]] under the leadership of [[Kya Mordrayn]]. Her personal elite force of the Doomkin was led by [[Azmark Duathel]], with a ''doomkin scarab'' hanging around his neck. Azmark and his squad eventually met their doom facing the group of adventurers known as the [[Veiled Ones]], trying to stop the heroes from restoring the corrupted ''[[mythal]]''.
